Group.name: Unaccompanied Minors
Group.description: Minors under 18 who arrive in France without a legal guardian, entitled to special protection and services.

Group.name: Women Refugees
Group.description: Female refugees who may face gender-specific persecution and require tailored services and protection.

Group.name: LGBTQ+ Refugees
Group.description: Refugees facing persecution due to their sexual orientation or gender identity, requiring specialized legal and social support.

Group.name: Refugee Families
Group.description: Refugee families including spouses, children, and extended family members seeking reunification and collective asylum.

Group.name: Asylum Seekers
Group.description: Individuals seeking asylum in France, awaiting the determination of their refugee status.

Group.name: Subsidiary Protection Beneficiaries
Group.description: Individuals who do not qualify as refugees but are protected from deportation due to serious risks in their home country.

Group.name: Students in Exile
Group.description: Refugee or asylum-seeking students pursuing education in France under special protection or scholarship programs.

Group.name: Stateless Persons
Group.description: Individuals without nationality who seek protection and recognition in France.

Group.name: Human Trafficking Survivors
Group.description: Survivors of human trafficking seeking protection and support services in France.

Group.name: Vulnerable Groups
Group.description: Groups of refugees or asylum seekers who are considered vulnerable due to age, health, or other factors, requiring special protection.

Group.name: Political Refugees
Group.description: Refugees who have fled their country due to political persecution, seeking asylum in France.

Group.name: War Refugees
Group.description: Individuals who have fled their home countries due to armed conflict, seeking refuge in France.

Group.name: Ethnic Minority Refugees
Group.description: Refugees belonging to persecuted ethnic minorities, requiring protection and support in France.

Group.name: Religious Minority Refugees
Group.description: Refugees fleeing persecution based on their religion, seeking asylum and protection in France.

Group.name: Health Vulnerable Refugees
Group.description: Refugees with serious health conditions that make them particularly vulnerable, requiring specialized medical and social support.

Group.name: Disabled Refugees
Group.description: Refugees with disabilities requiring accessible services and accommodations in France.

Group.name: Refugee Children
Group.description: Children among refugee populations requiring specific protection, education, and social services.

Group.name: Elderly Refugees
Group.description: Older refugees who require special health care, housing, and social services in France.

Group.name: Internally Displaced Persons
Group.description: Individuals displaced within their home country but seeking asylum or protection in France due to ongoing threats.

Group.name: Climate Refugees
Group.description: Individuals displaced by climate change impacts, seeking asylum and protection in France.
